Title....: Disturbia

Genre....: Thriller

Plot.....: The advertising campaign suggests this is a remake of Rear Window, a film by Hitchcock which was in turn based upon a short story by Cornell Woolrich. If this is the case, Woolrich deserves a writing credit and his estate deserves royalties. If it is not true, the marketing department should cease and desist.
Filmed in: USA
Language.: English
If you are going to post a torrent.  At least let a few people get.  So it can be seeded.
